00050 void imb_freemipmapImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00051 {
00052     int a;
00053     
00054     for (a=1; a<ibuf->miptot; a++) {
00055         if (ibuf->mipmap[a-1])
00056             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf->mipmap[a-1]);
00057         ibuf->mipmap[a-1]= NULL;
00058     }
00059 
00060     ibuf->miptot= 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 /* any free rect frees mipmaps to be sure, creation is in render on first request */
00064 void imb_freerectfloatImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00065 {
00066     if (ibuf==NULL) return;
00067     
00068     if (ibuf->rect_float && (ibuf->mall & IB_rectfloat)) {
00069         MEM_freeN(ibuf->rect_float);
00070         ibuf->rect_float=NULL;
00071     }
00072 
00073     imb_freemipmapImBuf(ibuf);
00074     
00075     ibuf->rect_float= NULL;
00076     ibuf->mall &= ~IB_rectfloat;
00077 }
00078 
00079 /* any free rect frees mipmaps to be sure, creation is in render on first request */
00080 void imb_freerectImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00081 {
00082     if (ibuf==NULL) return;
00083 
00084     if (ibuf->rect && (ibuf->mall & IB_rect))
00085         MEM_freeN(ibuf->rect);
00086     ibuf->rect= NULL;
00087     
00088     imb_freemipmapImBuf(ibuf);
00089 
00090     ibuf->mall &= ~IB_rect;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void imb_freetilesImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00094 {
00095     int tx, ty;
00096 
00097     if (ibuf==NULL) return;
00098 
00099     if (ibuf->tiles && (ibuf->mall & IB_tiles)) {
00100         for (ty=0; ty<ibuf->ytiles; ty++) {
00101             for (tx=0; tx<ibuf->xtiles; tx++) {
00102                 if (ibuf->tiles[ibuf->xtiles*ty + tx]) {
00103                     imb_tile_cache_tile_free(ibuf, tx, ty);
00104                     MEM_freeN(ibuf->tiles[ibuf->xtiles*ty + tx]);
00105                 }
00106             }
00107         }
00108 
00109         MEM_freeN(ibuf->tiles);
00110     }
00111 
00112     ibuf->tiles= NULL;
00113     ibuf->mall &= ~IB_tiles;
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void freeencodedbufferImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00117 {
00118     if (ibuf==NULL) return;
00119 
00120     if (ibuf->encodedbuffer && (ibuf->mall & IB_mem))
00121         MEM_freeN(ibuf->encodedbuffer);
00122 
00123     ibuf->encodedbuffer = NULL;
00124     ibuf->encodedbuffersize = 0;
00125     ibuf->encodedsize = 0;
00126     ibuf->mall &= ~IB_mem;
00127 }

00129 void IMB_freezbufImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00130 {
00131     if (ibuf==NULL) return;
00132 
00133     if (ibuf->zbuf && (ibuf->mall & IB_zbuf))
00134         MEM_freeN(ibuf->zbuf);
00135 
00136     ibuf->zbuf= NULL;
00137     ibuf->mall &= ~IB_zbuf;
00138 }

00140 void IMB_freezbuffloatImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00141 {
00142     if (ibuf==NULL) return;
00143 
00144     if (ibuf->zbuf_float && (ibuf->mall & IB_zbuffloat))
00145         MEM_freeN(ibuf->zbuf_float);
00146 
00147     ibuf->zbuf_float= NULL;
00148     ibuf->mall &= ~IB_zbuffloat;

00151 void IMB_freeImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00152 {
00153     if (ibuf) {
00154         if (ibuf->refcounter > 0) {
00155             ibuf->refcounter--;
00156         }
00157         else {
00158             imb_freerectImBuf(ibuf);
00159             imb_freerectfloatImBuf(ibuf);
00160             imb_freetilesImBuf(ibuf);
00161             IMB_freezbufImBuf(ibuf);
00162             IMB_freezbuffloatImBuf(ibuf);
00163             freeencodedbufferImBuf(ibuf);
00164             IMB_metadata_free(ibuf);
00165             MEM_freeN(ibuf);
00166         }
00167     }
00168 }
00169 
00170 void IMB_refImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00171 {
00172     ibuf->refcounter++;
00173 }
00174 
00175 ImBuf * IMB_makeSingleUser(ImBuf *ibuf)
00176 {
00177     ImBuf * rval;
00178 
00179     if (!ibuf || ibuf->refcounter == 0) { return ibuf; }
00180 
00181     rval = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
00182 
00183     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00184 
00185     return rval;
00186 }
00187 
00188 short addzbufImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00189 {
00190     int size;
00191     
00192     if (ibuf==NULL) return FALSE;
00193     
00194     IMB_freezbufImBuf(ibuf);
00195     
00196     size = ibuf->x *ibuf->y *sizeof(unsigned int);
00197     if ((ibuf->zbuf = MEM_mapallocN(size, "addzbufImBuf"))) {
00198         ibuf->mall |= IB_zbuf;
00199         ibuf->flags |= IB_zbuf;
00200         return TRUE;
00201     }
00202     
00203     return FALSE;
00204 }
00205 
00206 short addzbuffloatImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00207 {
00208     int size;
00209     
00210     if (ibuf==NULL) return FALSE;
00211     
00212     IMB_freezbuffloatImBuf(ibuf);
00213     
00214     size = ibuf->x *ibuf->y *sizeof(float);
00215     if ((ibuf->zbuf_float = MEM_mapallocN(size, "addzbuffloatImBuf"))) {
00216         ibuf->mall |= IB_zbuffloat;
00217         ibuf->flags |= IB_zbuffloat;
00218         return TRUE;
00219     }
00220     
00221     return FALSE;
00222 }

00224 
00225 short imb_addencodedbufferImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00226 {
00227     if (ibuf==NULL) return FALSE;
00228 
00229     freeencodedbufferImBuf(ibuf);
00230 
00231     if (ibuf->encodedbuffersize == 0)
00232         ibuf->encodedbuffersize = 10000;
00233 
00234     ibuf->encodedsize = 0;
00235 
00236     if ((ibuf->encodedbuffer = MEM_mallocN(ibuf->encodedbuffersize, "addencodedbufferImBuf"))) {
00237         ibuf->mall |= IB_mem;
00238         ibuf->flags |= IB_mem;
00239         return TRUE;
00240     }
00241 
00242     return FALSE;
00243 }
00244 
00245 
00246 short imb_enlargeencodedbufferImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00247 {
00248     unsigned int newsize, encodedsize;
00249     void *newbuffer;
00250 
00251     if (ibuf==NULL) return FALSE;
00252 
00253     if (ibuf->encodedbuffersize < ibuf->encodedsize) {
00254         printf("imb_enlargeencodedbufferImBuf: error in parameters\n");
00255         return FALSE;
00256     }
00257 
00258     newsize = 2 *ibuf->encodedbuffersize;
00259     if (newsize < 10000) newsize = 10000;
00260 
00261     newbuffer = MEM_mallocN(newsize, "enlargeencodedbufferImBuf");
00262     if (newbuffer == NULL) return FALSE;
00263 
00264     if (ibuf->encodedbuffer) {
00265         memcpy(newbuffer, ibuf->encodedbuffer, ibuf->encodedsize);
00266     }
00267     else {
00268         ibuf->encodedsize = 0;
00269     }
00270 
00271     encodedsize = ibuf->encodedsize;
00272 
00273     freeencodedbufferImBuf(ibuf);
00274 
00275     ibuf->encodedbuffersize = newsize;
00276     ibuf->encodedsize = encodedsize;
00277     ibuf->encodedbuffer = newbuffer;
00278     ibuf->mall |= IB_mem;
00279     ibuf->flags |= IB_mem;
00280 
00281     return TRUE;
00282 }
00283 
00284 short imb_addrectfloatImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00285 {
00286     int size;
00287     
00288     if (ibuf==NULL) return FALSE;
00289     
00290     if (ibuf->rect_float)
00291         imb_freerectfloatImBuf(ibuf); /* frees mipmap too, hrm */
00292     
00293     size = ibuf->x *ibuf->y;
00294     size = size *4 *sizeof(float);
00295     ibuf->channels= 4;
00296     
00297     if ((ibuf->rect_float = MEM_mapallocN(size, "imb_addrectfloatImBuf"))) {
00298         ibuf->mall |= IB_rectfloat;
00299         ibuf->flags |= IB_rectfloat;
00300         return TRUE;
00301     }
00302     
00303     return FALSE;
00304 }
00305 
00306 /* question; why also add zbuf? */
00307 short imb_addrectImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00308 {
00309     int size;
00310 
00311     if (ibuf==NULL) return FALSE;
00312     
00313     /* don't call imb_freerectImBuf, it frees mipmaps, this call is used only too give float buffers display */
00314     if (ibuf->rect && (ibuf->mall & IB_rect))
00315         MEM_freeN(ibuf->rect);
00316     ibuf->rect= NULL;
00317     
00318     size = ibuf->x*ibuf->y;
00319     size = size*sizeof(unsigned int);
00320 
00321     if ((ibuf->rect = MEM_mapallocN(size, "imb_addrectImBuf"))) {
00322         ibuf->mall |= IB_rect;
00323         ibuf->flags |= IB_rect;
00324         if (ibuf->planes > 32) return (addzbufImBuf(ibuf));
00325         else return TRUE;
00326     }
00327 
00328     return FALSE;
00329 }
00330 
00331 short imb_addtilesImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00332 {
00333     if (ibuf==NULL) return FALSE;
00334 
00335     if (!ibuf->tiles)
00336         if ((ibuf->tiles = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned int*)*ibuf->xtiles*ibuf->ytiles, "imb_tiles")))
00337             ibuf->mall |= IB_tiles;
00338 
00339     return (ibuf->tiles != NULL);
00340 }
00341 
00342 ImBuf *IMB_allocImBuf(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, uchar planes, unsigned int flags)
00343 {
00344     ImBuf *ibuf;
00345 
00346     ibuf = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ImBuf), "ImBuf_struct");
00347 
00348     if (ibuf) {
00349         ibuf->x= x;
00350         ibuf->y= y;
00351         ibuf->planes= planes;
00352         ibuf->ftype= TGA;
00353         ibuf->channels= 4;  /* float option, is set to other values when buffers get assigned */
00354         ibuf->ppm[0]= ibuf->ppm[1]= 150.0 / 0.0254; /* 150dpi -> pixels-per-meter */
00355         
00356         if (flags & IB_rect) {
00357             if (imb_addrectImBuf(ibuf)==FALSE) {
00358                 IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00359                 return NULL;
00360             }
00361         }
00362         
00363         if (flags & IB_rectfloat) {
00364             if (imb_addrectfloatImBuf(ibuf)==FALSE) {
00365                 IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00366                 return NULL;
00367             }
00368         }
00369         
00370         if (flags & IB_zbuf) {
00371             if (addzbufImBuf(ibuf)==FALSE) {
00372                 IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00373                 return NULL;
00374             }
00375         }
00376         
00377         if (flags & IB_zbuffloat) {
00378             if (addzbuffloatImBuf(ibuf)==FALSE) {
00379                 IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00380                 return NULL;
00381             }
00382         }
00383     }
00384     return (ibuf);
00385 }
00386 
00387 /* does no zbuffers? */
00388 ImBuf *IMB_dupImBuf(ImBuf *ibuf1)
00389 {
00390     ImBuf *ibuf2, tbuf;
00391     int flags = 0;
00392     int a, x, y;
00393     
00394     if (ibuf1 == NULL) return NULL;
00395 
00396     if (ibuf1->rect) flags |= IB_rect;
00397     if (ibuf1->rect_float) flags |= IB_rectfloat;
00398 
00399     x = ibuf1->x;
00400     y = ibuf1->y;
00401     if (ibuf1->flags & IB_fields) y *= 2;
00402     
00403     ibuf2 = IMB_allocImBuf(x, y, ibuf1->planes, flags);
00404     if (ibuf2 == NULL) return NULL;
00405 
00406     if (flags & IB_rect)
00407         memcpy(ibuf2->rect, ibuf1->rect, x *y *sizeof(int));
00408     
00409     if (flags & IB_rectfloat)
00410         memcpy(ibuf2->rect_float, ibuf1->rect_float, ibuf1->channels *x *y *sizeof(float));
00411 
00412     if (ibuf1->encodedbuffer) {
00413         ibuf2->encodedbuffersize = ibuf1->encodedbuffersize;
00414         if (imb_addencodedbufferImBuf(ibuf2) == FALSE) {
00415             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf2);
00416             return NULL;
00417         }
00418 
00419         memcpy(ibuf2->encodedbuffer, ibuf1->encodedbuffer, ibuf1->encodedsize);
00420     }
00421 
00422     /* silly trick to copy the entire contents of ibuf1 struct over to ibuf */
00423     tbuf = *ibuf1;
00424     
00425     // fix pointers 
00426     tbuf.rect       = ibuf2->rect;
00427     tbuf.rect_float = ibuf2->rect_float;
00428     tbuf.encodedbuffer = ibuf2->encodedbuffer;
00429     tbuf.zbuf= NULL;
00430     tbuf.zbuf_float= NULL;
00431     for (a=0; a<IB_MIPMAP_LEVELS; a++)
00432         tbuf.mipmap[a]= NULL;
00433     
00434     // set malloc flag
00435     tbuf.mall       = ibuf2->mall;
00436     tbuf.c_handle           = NULL;
00437     tbuf.refcounter         = 0;
00438 
00439     // for now don't duplicate metadata
00440     tbuf.metadata = NULL;
00441 
00442     *ibuf2 = tbuf;
00443     
00444     return(ibuf2);
00445 }

00450 static void imbuf_cache_destructor(void *data)
00451 {
00452     ImBuf *ibuf = (ImBuf*) data;
00453 
00454     imb_freerectImBuf(ibuf);
00455     imb_freerectfloatImBuf(ibuf);
00456     IMB_freezbufImBuf(ibuf);
00457     IMB_freezbuffloatImBuf(ibuf);
00458     freeencodedbufferImBuf(ibuf);
00459 
00460     ibuf->c_handle = NULL;
00461 }

00464 static MEM_CacheLimiterC **get_imbuf_cache_limiter(void)
00465 {
00466     static MEM_CacheLimiterC *c = NULL;
00467 
00468     if (!c)
00469         c = new_MEM_CacheLimiter(imbuf_cache_destructor, NULL);
00470 
00471     return &c;
00472 }
